briefTitle: Comparing Efficacy and Safety of Insulin Degludec/Insulin Aspart Twice Daily and Biphasic Insulin Aspart Twice Daily in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Before, During and After Ramadan
officialTitle: A Trial Comparing Efficacy and Safety of Insulin Degludec/Insulin Aspart Twice Daily and Biphasic Insulin Aspart Twice Daily in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Before, During and After Ramadan
summary: This trial is conducted in Africa and Asia. The aim of this trial is to compare efficacy and safety of insulin degludec/insulin aspart twice daily and biphasic insulin aspart twice daily in subjects with type 2 diabetes mellitus before, during and after Ramadan.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From week 0 to end of Ramadan (day 29 of Ramadan)
